section.p: You manage to cut down the last vampire. Quickly, you cut off their heads to make sure they stay dead.

In the morning, your COMBAT rating returns to normal (if it was reduced in the fight) and the bodies of the vampires have dissolved in the sunlight. They have left and a book called the Black Diptych. It is a map of the tombs in the Crags of the Long Homes. Note the
Court of Hidden Faces 410
. Whenever you want to consult the book, note the paragraph you are at and .
When you are ready, you journey on. .
